panels.title: Treat Dodo requires_customer_action redirect as payment failed
panels.scene: A giant, confused Dodo bird is trying to deliver a treasure chest labeled 'PAYMENT'. Knight redirects the Dodo with a stern finger point. Villagers celebrate, throwing their empty wallets in the air.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: He saved us from...whatever a 'Dodo requires_customer_action redirect' is!

panels.title: Replace notification-badge step numbers with rounded-rect track loop
panels.scene: A team of scribes meticulously painting numbers onto tiny badges. Knight replaces their brushes with a stencil and a can of spray paint. The badges now have rounded rectangles.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: The rounded rectangles! They soothe my soul!

panels.title: Add E2E tests for CallStatusPill with screenshot proof
panels.scene: The villagers are having a group therapy session where they all hold up screenshot printouts of 'CallStatusPills' and sob uncontrollably. The knight is standing nearby holding a magnifying glass, examining the 'CallStatusPills' on a giant screen.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: The screenshot PROVES that our calls are being monitored by a PILL!

bubbles.speaker: Knight
bubbles.text: It's end-to-end testing. I assure you, it's not an actual pill.

panels.title: 7 commits. 0 dead Dodos. 3 new status pills.
panels.scene: Knight sitting wearily on a pile of scrolls. Villagers are erecting a giant monument made of rounded rectangles. One villager is carving 'E2E' into the base.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: We shall forever sing the ballad of the status pill!

bubbles.speaker: Knight
bubbles.text: Just... try not to break anything.
